title: Discount on Chicken Meals
description: Tasty chicken meals from PizzaWorld at an unbeatable student price — don’t miss this student-discount offer.
terms: Discount applied automatically when redeeming. Show this offer and your student ID at the counter.

title: Buy 1 Get 1 Coffee
description: Grab your caffeine boost from ChickenMax with this special general sale offer made just for students.
terms: Buy one and get one free of equal or lesser value. Apply this offer during checkout on the website.

terms: Enjoy your free item — no purchase necessary. Apply this offer during checkout on the website.
